title: FIFA World Cup : Number of goals scored at each tournament 1930 to 2018
summary: This is a bar chart representing Countries in the x axis and Number of goals scored in the y axis.
Countries Brazil 2014 has the highest Number of goals scored and Italy 1934 has the lowest Number of goals scored.
The Number of goals scored of Countries Brazil 2014 is 2.44% larger than the minimum value at Italy 1934.

max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Countries in the x axis and Number of goals scored in the y axis.
The Number of goals scored is appeared to be the highest at Countries Brazil 2014 and lowest at Countries Italy 1934.
Countries France 1998 has the second highest value for Number of goals scored.
